In the mood for some spooks? Here are 10 of D-FW's most haunted destinations

You don't need to wait until Oct. 31 to visit haunted houses or get your share of scares. From White Rock Lake to the Adolphus Hotel, Dallas-Fort Worth sites are home to ghosts and spirits. Self-opening doors. Mysterious echoes. Unexplained creaking. Here's your guide to the spookiest places in Dallas: Feel the chills yet?

Aurelia Han/Staff
